name: ChibiMaker
description:
Make your own Chibi! :D
Do post your creations in the comments, I'd love to see it!

Status: In-development!

Working on it as we speak ^-^ Feel free to suggest features, items or give feedback!

Special credits to @Lyrcaxis my code-sensei <3

Upcoming features:
  • Skin colors
  • Hide UI

See the progress & more upcoming features on Trello!

Games made with these Chibis!

If you make a game using these chibis let me know!
